subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marian Gaborik scored twice for the Rangers, but Mike Rupp completed his first career hat trick to help the Pittsburgh Penguins seal a sweep of the home-and-home series.
snippet: Marian Gaborik scored twice for the Rangers, but Mike Rupp completed his first career hat trick to help the Pittsburgh Penguins seal a sweep of the home-and-home series.
